page.title: 02STATES BUILDING,ST.HELIER
page.content: The{States Building}is found in Royal Square.It houses the island government {(The States)}and the{Royal Court. } In the States the Bailiff presides over 12 Senators,12 Parish Constables and 29 Deputies.The Queen is represented by the Lt.Governor.The States governs by a series of 31 committees eg.Public Works,Housing, Tourism,Education,Agriculture. The States meet once a week, when the Bailiff enters thhe Chamber followed by the Viscount carrying the Mace.When the Bailiff is seated the Greffier takes a roll call,the Dean reads prayers and then the business starts. The{Royal Court}deals with serious criminal cases for which the most severe penalty is still death, although this is inevitably commuted to life imprisonment by the Home Secretary.
